question: [Explain] Portugues: Apresente which category has the highest bar do grafico de barras.

qas.question: [Explain] Portugues: Apresente which category has the highest bar do grafico de barras.
[Brief] Dansk: Angiv which category has the lowest bar fra sojlediagrammet.
[Practice] English: Tell what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars from the bar chart.
